name: Wheeli
description: Wheeli is the carpooling app for college students. Think of it as the Airbnb for the empty car seats on the road - 80% of which are empty when people drive.
one_liner: Wheeli is the carpooling app for college students. Think of it as the Airbnb for the empty car seats on the road - 80% of which are empty when people drive.
location: New York City, New York, United States
